patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses:
B.N. College Of Engineering And Technology has been affailated with Abdul kalam Technical University, AKTU provide enviable higher education in Techanical , Business(MBA) and pharmacy to students in Uttarpardesh.
For Bachelors Degree in computer science and Mechanical engineering we are NBA accredited.

patterns: how long will be Btech course
how long will it take to complete B.tech course
responses: Our college offers 4 year long B.tech course .

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: B.N. College Of Engineering And Technology is located in Lucknow pokharaUttar Pardesh  near Bakshi ka Talab.

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses: Academic Level 12th pass with atlest 60% in PCM, For Direct Admissions.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be two or 8 classes per day Including Labs. Each class will be of 1 hour each.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Lucknow. We adopt a Indian teaching methodology, following the Smart class techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.
There are assignments which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 9:00 am to 4:30 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
